ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nope. 52 Druid s get a second dot, Breath of Ro, that is the first good dot that stacks with their Swarm line. Then at 53 they get another dot which looks
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Oct 12/00, "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...> wrote:
> Druid quad kite raptors all teh time.. I think they get some kickass 4
> target dot at level 52 or such.. you see them from 53-56 out there.

Nope. 52 Druid's get a second dot, Breath of Ro, that is the first good
dot that stacks with their Swarm line. Then at 53 they get another dot
which looks like a swarm upgrade but actually stacks with their last
swarm spell. This allows them to stack up 3 dots at once for 4k dmg over
1 minute. Druids don't get an upgrade to the 49 AoE until 58, Fist of
Karana, and by that time raptors would be all green. The only other post
50 AoE they get is a rain spell, and rain spells don't follow the
target, they rain on the target area so they are useless for quad
kiting.

http://www.eqdruids.com/expansio1.htm


I see other druids out there too, but they're all rotting, not kiting.


--
